\begin{groupplot}[
    group style={
        group size=4 by 1,
        horizontal sep=1.5cm,
        vertical sep=2cm
    },
    width=7cm,
    height=5cm,
    xlabel={Layer},
    legend pos=north west,
    grid=major,
    grid style={dashed, gray!30}
]

    \nextgroupplot[title={HFER}, ylabel={HFER},]
    \addplot [name path=v_upper, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=v_upper] {\HFERdata};
    \addplot [name path=v_lower, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=v_lower] {\HFERdata};
    \addplot [blue!20] fill between [of=v_upper and v_lower];

    \addplot [name path=i_upper, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=i_upper] {\HFERdata};
    \addplot [name path=i_lower, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=i_lower] {\HFERdata};
    \addplot [red!20] fill between [of=i_upper and i_lower];

    \addplot [blue, thick] table [x=layer, y=v_mean] {\HFERdata};
    \addplot [red, thick] table [x=layer, y=i_mean] {\HFERdata};
    
    \addlegendentry{Valid}
    \addlegendentry{Invalid}


    \nextgroupplot[title={Fiedler}, ]
    \addplot [name path=v_upper, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=v_upper] {\Fiedlerdata};
    \addplot [name path=v_lower, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=v_lower] {\Fiedlerdata};
    \addplot [blue!20] fill between [of=v_upper and v_lower];

    \addplot [name path=i_upper, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=i_upper] {\Fiedlerdata};
    \addplot [name path=i_lower, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=i_lower] {\Fiedlerdata};
    \addplot [red!20] fill between [of=i_upper and i_lower];

    \addplot [blue, thick] table [x=layer, y=v_mean] {\Fiedlerdata};
    \addplot [red, thick] table [x=layer, y=i_mean] {\Fiedlerdata};
    

    \nextgroupplot[title={Smoothness}, ]
    \addplot [name path=v_upper, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=v_upper] {\Smoothnessdata};
    \addplot [name path=v_lower, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=v_lower] {\Smoothnessdata};
    \addplot [blue!20] fill between [of=v_upper and v_lower];

    \addplot [name path=i_upper, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=i_upper] {\Smoothnessdata};
    \addplot [name path=i_lower, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=i_lower] {\Smoothnessdata};
    \addplot [red!20] fill between [of=i_upper and i_lower];

    \addplot [blue, thick] table [x=layer, y=v_mean] {\Smoothnessdata};
    \addplot [red, thick] table [x=layer, y=i_mean] {\Smoothnessdata};
    

    \nextgroupplot[title={Entropy}, ]
    \addplot [name path=v_upper, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=v_upper] {\Entropydata};
    \addplot [name path=v_lower, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=v_lower] {\Entropydata};
    \addplot [blue!20] fill between [of=v_upper and v_lower];

    \addplot [name path=i_upper, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=i_upper] {\Entropydata};
    \addplot [name path=i_lower, draw=none, forget plot] table [x=layer, y=i_lower] {\Entropydata};
    \addplot [red!20] fill between [of=i_upper and i_lower];

    \addplot [red, thick] table [x=layer, y=i_mean] {\Entropydata};
